subject: CFP:: The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014):: Malaysia
from: "The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU. http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/wcit2014/ Deadline submission:: Feb. 18, 2014 All the registered papers will be published in the Digital Library of SDIWC +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- ***You are invited to participate in The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014) that will be held in Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation (APU), Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on March 18-20, 2014 ***The Congress will be held over three days, with presentations delivered by researchers from the international community, including presentations from keynote speakers and state-of-the-art lectures. Important Dates ============== Submission Deadline : Feb. 18, 2014 Notification of Acceptance: March 04, 2014 Camera Ready Submission : March 08, 2014 Last Day for Registration : March 08, 2014 Conference Dates : March 18-20, 2014 ---------------------------------------- If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5 Please Accept our Apology for Multiple Posting. THANK YOU.

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/wcit2014/

Deadline submission:: Feb. 18, 2014

All the registered papers will be published in the Digital Library of SDIWC

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

***You are invited to participate in The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014) that will be held in Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation (APU), Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on March 18-20, 2014

***The Congress will be held over three days, with presentations delivered by researchers from the international community, including presentations from keynote speakers and state-of-the-art lectures.


Important Dates
==============
Submission Deadline : Feb. 18, 2014
Notification of Acceptance: March 04, 2014
Camera Ready Submission : March 08, 2014
Last Day for Registration : March 08, 2014
Conference Dates : March 18-20, 2014

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=d67fac30874ed23b1c8bf6f96d9f2cb5
